p:
A germination experiment was performed in the physiology lab of PMAS Arid Agriculture University, Rawalpindi. Seeds of two lettuce varieties (Iceberg and Boston) obtained from the National Agricultural Research Centre Islamabad, were surface sterilized by treating with sodium hypochlorite (1%) solution for 5 min
46 . After that, seeds were successively washed with distilled water and were placed in Petri plates. There was a total of eleven treatments in this experiment which are described in Supplementary Table 1. Germination percentage, seedling vigor index, and promptness index
46 were measured for each treatment.
